contexts.context: ...with a potion made from ash yams and dreugh <mark>wax</mark>. Ash yam is a tough tuberous root vegetable...
...vegetable common to the Ascadian Isles region. dreugh <mark>wax</mark> is a tough, waxy substance scraped from dreugh...
...creatures, and hunting them for their hides and <mark>wax</mark> is a dangerous occupation.
...battle with the Dreugh in the cave. Dreugh <mark>wax</mark> may be bought at the Temple in Gnisis....
...it is customary to leave a portion of dreugh <mark>wax</mark> as a token of Vivec's victorious struggle with Ruddy...
